description: Realtime graphs of sensor data Provides low level access to the devices sensors. Readout is presented in a graph for easy side by side comparison with other devices. Usage: * Touch desired sensor on the list screen in order to start the readout. Long touch the sensor to show it's details. Use "Back" to close the details dialog again. * On readout view, touching the graph will stop the sensor from being read out. After stopping, the graph can be scrolled and or panned by a drag or pinch gesture. To restart the readout, return to the main sensor list and select the sensor again.
